system.title: MyFRDCSA
system.acronym-expansion: My Formalized Research Database: Cluster, Study and Apply
system.medium-description: The MyFRDCSA system implements our ontology of software, in addition to being a leading project which coordinates other projects. Its role is mainly conceptual at this point as the key ontology systems are not yet in place. Currently it uses an OO-Perl architecture which represents projects and systems, and provides functionality that is too general for any of the current subsystems.
